definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: It looks like we're going to have a thundershower.
sentences.chinese: 看样子我们会遇上雷阵雨的。

sentences.english: We had a thunder shower yesterday.
I hope there aren't going to be thunderstorms on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 我希望星期三没有雷阵雨。

sentences.english: The morning forecast predicted thunder showers later in the day .
sentences.chinese: 早晨的气象报告预测当天下午有雷阵雨。

sentences.english: Today most parts of Central China will have thundershowers.
sentences.chinese: 今天华中大部分地区有雷阵雨。

sentences.english: Tina:Sometimes there are sudden thundershowers like this in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 台北有时候都会像这样突然会下起雷阵雨的。

sentences.english: It looks like we are going to have a thunder shower.
sentences.chinese: 看样子我们会遇上雷阵雨。

sentences.english: There was a thunder shower at night.
Sometimes it hails during a summer thundershower.
sentences.chinese: 有时候夏天的雷阵雨中会夹有冰雹。

sentences.english: The thundershower had temporarily scattered the swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 雷阵雨暂时驱散了游泳者们。

sentences.english: The dark clouds and thunder suggest on impending thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 乌云及雷响代表雷阵雨即将到来。

sentences.english: Rain and thundershowers are expected in the southern plateau region.
sentences.chinese: 高原南部地区有望有雨和雷阵雨。

sentences.english: The thundershower had temporarily scattered the swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 雷阵雨暂时驱散了游泳的人。

sentences.english: A thunder shower is coming up.
After the thundershower , we saw a rainbow in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 雷阵雨过后，我们在天空中看到彩虹。
